00021 class projectIO():
00022     """Standalone class (doesn't need to be registered within the main app window)
00023      that should properly handles the disk I/O operations. Methods:
00024         - new;
00025         - open;
00026         - save;
00027         - saveas;
00028         - close;
00029         - register (on app object and on the XML tree)"""
00030     def __init__(self, app = None): # main application window - None? if
00031         self.app = app
00032         self.lwd = None
00033         self.status = 0 # project status flag - 1 not saved, 0 saved
00034                         # maybe a list [0, 1, 0] - trunk, geometry, mesh
00035         self.stats = {"ncsys": 0,
00036                       "npoints":0,
00037                       "nlines":0,
00038                       "nfaces":0} # holds the number of each geometrical entity
00039         self.files = {"trunk": None,
00040                       "geom": None} # associated files - keep track here
00041         self.csys = {} # hopefully will be more clear - the XML is parsed then
00042                        # info is contained here
00043         self.points = {}
00044 
00045         self.setdir()
00046 
00047     def setdir(): # ????
00048         if self.app == None:
00049             self.lwd = None
00050         else:
00051             self.lwd = app.lwd
00052 
00053     def register(self):
00054         """Called when the drawing on canvas must be made. It assumes that:
00055         - file was already loaded from the disk (resides into self.files);
00056         - it had been parsed by using __parseXML;
00057         - the output of parsing resides into proper structures, i.e. self.csys,
00058             self.points, etc."""
00059         pass
00060     def __parseXML(self):
00061         """Called by new & open methods. Should hide most of the details about
00062         XML parsing. Assumes file is already opened (but unparsed). Updates
00063         the appropriate structures. """
00064         pass
00065     def __updateXML(self):
00066         "Auxiliary method, called by save and saveas"
00067         pass
00068     def new(self):
00069         pass
00070     def open(self):
00071         pass
00072     def save(self):
00073         pass
00074     def saveas(self):
00075         pass
00076     def close(self):
00077         pass

00079 def newProject(app):
00080     """Generates a fully xml tree and file of the project trunk. It updates the global variables so that other \
00081        methods can work on the xml project tree, project trunk, etc.""" 
00082     # change to the last known location of the working directory
00083 
00084     os.chdir(app.lwd)
00085 
00086     if "NewProject.project" not in os.listdir(os.getcwd()):
00087         ProjFolder = "NewProject.project"
00088     else:
00089         dPattern=re.compile(r'^NewProject(\d*).project$')
00090         ldirs=[s for s in os.listdir(os.getcwd()) if os.path.isdir(s)]      # separate folders from files
00091         l=[s for s in ldirs if dPattern.search(s) is not None]              # separate folders with pattern "NewProject*.project"
00092 
00093         gldirs=[int(dPattern.search(s).groups()[0]) for s in l if (dPattern.search(s).groups())[0] is not '']
00094         if gldirs==[]: ProjFolder = "NewProject1.project"          # found "NewProject.project" in the current directory
00095         else:
00096             DirNo=[i for i in range(1, max(gldirs)+1) if i not in gldirs]
00097             if DirNo == []:
00098                 ProjFolder = "NewProject"+str(max(gldirs)+1)+".project" # found a sequence of "NewProject*.project" named folders
00099             else:
00100                 ProjFolder = "NewProject"+str(min(DirNo))+".project"    # found a sequence of "NewProject*.project" named folders
00101                                                                         # with missing pieces
00102 
00103     app.title(ProjFolder)
00104 
00105     # create the project trunk:
00106 
00107     app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"] = [minidom.Document(), None]
00108     app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].encoding="UTF-8"     # to load from a global configuration file !!!
00109 
00110     projelement=app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createElement("Project")
00111     projelement.setAttribute('name', ProjFolder.replace(".project", ""))
00112     app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].appendChild(projelement)
00113     ########################## Geometry #########################################
00114     # register the geometry file entry in the project file
00115     geomelement=app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createElement("Geometry")
00116     geomelement.setAttribute('dim', '2D')
00117     geomelement.setAttribute('type', 'plane')
00118     geomelement.appendChild(app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createTextNode("%s.geometry.xml"%ProjFolder.replace(".project", "")))
00119     projelement.appendChild(geomelement)
00120 
00121     # initiate the geometry
00122     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"] = [minidom.Document(), None, []]
00123     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].encoding="UTF-8"
00124 
00125     compdomelement=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].createElement("ComputationDomain")
00126     compdomelement.setAttribute('dimension', '2D')
00127     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].appendChild(compdomelement)
00128 
00129     csyselement=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].createElement("CoorSys")
00130     pointelement=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].createElement("Points")
00131     linelement=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].createElement("Lines")
00132     surfacelement=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].createElement("Surfaces")
00133 
00134     pointelement.appendChild(app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].createTextNode(""))
00135     linelement.appendChild(app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].createTextNode(""))
00136     surfacelement.appendChild(app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].createTextNode(""))
00137 
00138     compdomelement.appendChild(csyselement)
00139     compdomelement.appendChild(pointelement)
00140     compdomelement.appendChild(linelement)
00141     compdomelement.appendChild(surfacelement)
00142 
00143     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][2]=[csyselement, pointelement, linelement, surfacelement]
00144 
00145     ############################## Mesh #########################################
00146     # register the mesh file entry in the project file
00147     meshelement=app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createElement("Mesh")
00148     meshelement.setAttribute('status', 'nomesh')
00149     meshelement.appendChild(app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createTextNode("%s.mesh.xml"%ProjFolder.replace(".project", "")))
00150     projelement.appendChild(meshelement)
00151 
00152     # initiate the mesh
00153     app.xmlprojfiles["mesh"] = [minidom.Document(), None]
00154 
00155     ############################ Physics ########################################
00156     physelement=app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createElement("Physics")
00157     physelement.setAttribute('status', 'nophysics')
00158     physelement.appendChild(app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createTextNode("%s.physics.xml"%ProjFolder.replace(".project", "")))
00159     projelement.appendChild(physelement)
00160     ########################### Assembler #######################################
00161     assemelement=app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createElement("Assembler")
00162     assemelement.setAttribute('custom', 'no')
00163     assemelement.appendChild(app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createTextNode("%s.assembler.xml"%ProjFolder.replace(".project", "")))
00164     projelement.appendChild(assemelement)
00165     ########################### Postprocess #####################################
00166     reselement=app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createElement("Postprocess")
00167     reselement.setAttribute('status', 'noresults')
00168     reselement.appendChild(app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].createTextNode("%s.results.xml"%ProjFolder.replace(".project", "")))
00169     projelement.appendChild(reselement)
00170     #############################################################################
00171 
00172     app.initDrawingArea()
00173     app.DrawingArea.setGlobalCsys() # creates global csys for new projects
00174

00176 def openProject(app):
00177     os.chdir(app.lwd)
00178     filetypes=[("Project files", "*project.xml")]
00179     openedProject=tkinter.filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=filetypes, title="Open an existing project")
00180     localdir, localfile = os.path.split(openedProject)
00181     app.lwd=localdir # to change in the appropriate xml settings file !!!!!!
00182     os.chdir(app.lwd)
00183 
00184     app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"]=[minidom.parse(openedProject), openedProject] # app title ??
00185 
00186     app.title(localfile.replace(".xml", ""))
00187 
00188     geomlocation=os.path.join(app.lwd,
00189                               os.path.join(localfile.replace(".xml", ""),
00190                                            localfile.replace("project", "geometry")))
00191 
00192     # parse the geometry file
00193     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"]=[minidom.parse(geomlocation), None, []]
00194 
00195     # draw the geometry file content on canvas
00196 
00197     # draw csys
00198     # parse the info into the appropriate data structure
00199 
00200     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][2].append(app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].getElementsByTagName("CoorSys")[0])
00201     csyslist=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].getElementsByTagName("Csys")
00202 
00203     # draw points
00204     # parse the info into the appropriate data structure
00205     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][2].append(app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].getElementsByTagName("Points")[0])
00206     pointlist=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].getElementsByTagName("Point")
00207 
00208     app.initDrawingArea()
00209 
00210     for i in csyslist:
00211         # retrieve attributes
00212         if i.getAttribute("id") == "global":
00213             app.DrawingArea.setGlobalCsys() # creates global csys
00214         else:
00215             parent=app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("parent")]["floatinfo"]
00216 
00217             # retrieve data
00218             data=i.firstChild.data.strip().split()
00219             x, y, rotation = float(data[0]), float(data[1]), float(data[2])
00220 
00221             app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("id")]={"floatinfo":fkernel.csys(parent=parent,
00222                                                                                  origin=[x, y],
00223                                                                                  rotation=rotation,
00224                                                                                  label=i.getAttribute("id"),
00225                                                                                  type_=i.getAttribute("type")),
00226                                                         "intPosition":app.DrawingArea.float2int(app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("parent")]["intPosition"],
00227                                                                                                 [x, y],
00228                                                                                                 i.getAttribute("type")),
00229                                                         "graphRepr":{"visible":1}}
00230             # for now the csys are allways visible
00231             app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["entities"]=app.DrawingArea.dispCsys(app.DrawingArea.float2int(app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("parent")]["intPosition"], [x, y], type_=i.getAttribute("type")), rotation=rotation, visible=1)
00232 
00233             # associate proper tags
00234             app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["tags"]=[i.getAttribute("id"), "csys", "translate"]  # add zoom later !!!
00235 
00236             for k in app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["tags"]:
00237                 app.DrawingArea.addtag_withtag(k, app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["entities"][0])
00238                 app.DrawingArea.addtag_withtag(k, app.DrawingArea.csys[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["entities"][1])
00239 
00240     # draw points
00241     for i in pointlist:
00242         # retrieve attributes
00243         pCsys=i.getAttribute("csys")
00244 
00245         # retrieve data
00246         data=i.firstChild.data.strip().split()
00247         x, y = float(data[0]), float(data[1])
00248 
00249         app.DrawingArea.points[i.getAttribute("id")]={"floatinfo":fkernel.point(parent=None,
00250                                                                                 transformation=None,
00251                                                                                 coords=[x, y],
00252                                                                                 csys=app.DrawingArea.csys[pCsys]["floatinfo"],
00253                                                                                 label=i.getAttribute("id")),
00254                                                       "intPosition":app.DrawingArea.float2int(app.DrawingArea.csys[pCsys]["intPosition"],
00255                                                                                               [x, y],
00256                                                                                               type_=app.DrawingArea.csys[pCsys]["floatinfo"].type_),
00257                                                       "graphRepr":{"visible":1}}
00258         # for now the points are allways visible
00259         app.DrawingArea.points[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["entities"]=app.DrawingArea.dispPoint(app.DrawingArea.float2int(app.DrawingArea.csys[pCsys]["intPosition"],
00260                                                                                                                                   [x, y],
00261                                                                                                                                   type_=app.DrawingArea.csys[pCsys]["floatinfo"].type_),
00262                                                                                                         "square",
00263                                                                                                         "default",
00264                                                                                                         visible=1,
00265                                                                                                         filled=1)
00266 
00267         # associate proper tags
00268         app.DrawingArea.points[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["tags"]=[i.getAttribute("id"),
00269                                                                            "point",
00270                                                                            "translate"]
00271 
00272         for k in app.DrawingArea.points[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["tags"]:
00273             app.DrawingArea.addtag_withtag(k,
00274                                            app.DrawingArea.points[i.getAttribute("id")]["graphRepr"]["entities"])
00275 
00276     # draw lines
00277 
00278     # draw surfaces
00279

00282 def saveProject(app):
00283     os.chdir(app.lwd)
00284     ProjFolder=app.title()
00285     os.mkdir(os.path.join(os.getcwd(), ProjFolder))
00286 
00287     # save main project file first:
00288     app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][1] = open("%s.xml" % ProjFolder, "w+")
00289     app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][1].write(app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].toprettyxml(indent = '   ', encoding=app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].encoding))
00290     app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][1].close()
00291 
00292     # save geometry
00293     os.chdir(ProjFolder)
00294     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][1] = open("%s.geometry.xml" % ProjFolder.replace(".project", ""), "w+")
00295     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][1].write(app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].toprettyxml(indent = '   ', encoding=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].encoding))
00296     app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][1].close()
00297 
00298     # save mesh
00299     app.xmlprojfiles["mesh"][1] = open("%s.mesh.xml" % ProjFolder.replace(".project", ""), "w+")
00300     app.xmlprojfiles["mesh"][1].close()
00301 
00302     os.chdir(app.lwd)
00303                 
00304 def saveAsProject(app):
00305     ProjFolder=os.path.split(tkinter.filedialog.asksaveasfilename(initialdir=app.lwd, parent=app)) # full path
00306 
00307     if ProjFolder is not "":
00308         app.title(ProjFolder[1]+".project")
00309         os.chdir(ProjFolder[0])
00310 
00311         app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][1] = open("%s.project.xml" % ProjFolder[1], "w+")
00312         app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][1].write(app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].toprettyxml(indent = '   ', encoding=app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][0].encoding))
00313         app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][1].close()
00314 
00315         # save geometry
00316         os.mkdir(ProjFolder[1]+".project")
00317         os.chdir(ProjFolder[1]+".project")
00318         app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][1] = open("%s.geometry.xml" % ProjFolder[1], "w+")
00319         app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][1].write(app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].toprettyxml(indent = '   ', encoding=app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].encoding))
00320         app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][1].close()
00321 
00322         # save mesh
00323         app.xmlprojfiles["mesh"][1] = open("%s.mesh.xml" % ProjFolder[1], "w+")
00324         app.xmlprojfiles["mesh"][1].close()
00325 
00326         os.chdir(ProjFolder[0])
00327         app.lwd=ProjFolder[0]
00328 
00329 def closeProject(app):
00330     try:
00331         app.xmlprojfiles["trunk"][1].close()
00332         app.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][1].close()
00333         app.xmlprojfiles["mesh"][1].close()
00334     except:
00335         pass
00336     app.destroy()
00337     app.quit()
